turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hi. how can i help you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I would like to place an order for pizza from Bella Luna.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure, let me get the order started for you. what would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I would like four small pizzas, with a thick crust on all of them. And the first one, I want it to be a Buffalo chicken pizza.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: The second one, I would like it to be a.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: pepperoni pizza.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Third one, I would like it to be a spinach and feta pizza.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: (deleted)

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: onions.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: ham.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: bacon.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Fourth one I wanted to have.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: white sauce and cheese.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sorry, Bella Luna does not have buffalo chicken. did you want another topping. it also sounds like you listed 5 pizzas, not 4. did u want 5 pizzas instead?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No, I want four pizzas. Sorry. I'm sorry. My mind just

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: If it doesn't have buffalo chicken I just want regular chicken then.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Just stick with the last the last order the last item that I sent out last pizza order I sent.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: got it. so you want 4 small pizzas, all with thick crust, 1 chicken pizza, 1 pepperoni pizza, 1 spinach and feta pizza, and 1 with onions, ham, and bacon.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: is that right?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, yes that is correct.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: great, glad i got that down. the total for your order is $50.50. should i place it now?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: you got it, i've sent the receipt to your phone. the pizzas will b ready for pick up in 35 mins.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: did you need anything else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No, that's all.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: awesome, take care.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Bye.
